descriptionHtml:
(I DONT KNOW IF IT SHOULD BE CHEATS AND GOD ITEMS OR NOT)

A simple batch file.. extract to your /common/skyrim folder ingame say "bat falmer" youll get it. and without the quotes.
And it's my first upload ever. please don't be mean to me.

This light armor look really really good for a vanilla armor, My character was a snow elf.

And if you download it with Nexus Mod Manager you'll have to manually go to your data and pull it out to your skyrim folder.
And you'll need dawnguard.

I mainly created it because i'm lazy.. when i start a new character i could always get it by typing those words "Bat falmer" I just thought i'd share it.

it's mainly a good starting armor for sneaky characters. the armor itself is really rare. to upgrade it use a refined moonstone ingot at a workbench.
Somehow I like to write way too much...
author: HeavyWeaponsPerson
